dt: {bc}a bent or angular throwing club typically flat on one side and rounded on the other so that it soars or curves in flight
{bc}one designed to return near the thrower
{bc}an act or utterance that backfires on its originator

et: Dharuk (Australian aboriginal language of the Port Jackson area) {it}bumarinʸ{/it}
shortdef: a bent or angular throwing club typically flat on one side and rounded on the other so that it soars or curves in flight; especially : one designed to return near the thrower
an act or utterance that backfires on its originator
